Room.Name: Appleton Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Appleton Road, east of the Klondike Wheat Fields.
Room.LongDescription: You can see the thin, mesh-wire fence which protects the large Klondike Wheat Fields on the west side of the road. There is no entrance to the Fields from this side of the road. The only entrance is located on the western edge of the Wheat Fields off of Lankshire Parkway. On the east side of the road, you can see a small inn and tavern where a number of people are wandering in and out. The entrance to the inn is located off of Nagaritha Drive.
